Class SchedulePreferencePage

All Implemented Interfaces:
IKiemConfigEventListener, java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.IDialogPage, org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.IMessageProvider, org.eclipse.jface.preference.IPreferencePage, org.eclipse.jface.viewers.IBaseLabelProvider, org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ILabelProvider, org.eclipse.swt.events.FocusListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SWTEventListener, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPreferencePage
public class SchedulePreferencePage
extends org.eclipse.jface.preference.PreferencePage
implements org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPreferencePage, org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ILabelProvider, IKiemConfigEventListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.FocusListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener

Preference page for the scheduling preferences in KIEM.

Modified version of the LayoutPreferencePage in de.cau.cs.kieler.kiml.ui by msp.

Author:
soh
